item.title: Aruco Tag detection using OpenCV and Python
item.description: Aruco Tag, also known as AR Tag, is widely used in navigation and tracking purposes in robotics field. With machine learning and modern image processing techniques, it is not difficult to detect and identify AR tags. However, in this post, I will try to use the most basic image processing tools of OpenCV for the approach to that problem. Let’s break down the code in segments for understanding it better.
